text: 13:11 Ua Me Ini 29:14; Ofa Gami 6:30; 16:27; Dɨboboniba 19:3Ofa gamir gumazibar dapanim, an asɨzibar ghuziba inigha Bar Anogoroghezir Danganir kamɨn aven ghugha, arazir kuraba gɨn amangasa ofa gami. Egha asɨzir kabar kuaba inigha gumazamiziba iti naghɨn azenan ghua saghon da tuema, da isia mɨghɨri.
